titleStmt.title: URFA-190
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.

spanGrp.span: Once upon a time, master, there was a man who had an old blind mother. She was ninety or hundred years old.
She was sick at home and made them a lot of work as she was always crying.
They had put her in a room and locked her there. But she was only crying, boohoo.
They took her to doctors, they walked around with her, they did anything for her, but it was useless. She kept on crying.
Her illness was crying; its name is crying boohoo; she was only crying.
One day a guest came to them; a nasty guest, God forbid, a bad guy.
He was sleeping overnight at their place. He was his friend; her son’s friend.
They prepared for him a place to sleep in the room; he went to sleep at night and (wanted to) sleep but the sound of crying, boohoo, was on until the morning.
In the morning he stood up and said to the host, “Hey dude, what’s this voice,
which is coming from there until the morning.” He said, “Hey, my brother, don’t you know? This is my mother; she is only crying, only crying.
Nothing but crying boohoo; our old mother is blind and she cries.
No matter how often we took her to doctors, to hospitals, to medical centers, they did not find any cure for her.”
He said “Would you allow me to see her? Where is she? Show her to me!”
“Yes,” He said, “In that room. Go ahead and have a look at her!”
He said, “I want to go inside to her and I want no one else to come to me. I want to see what her woes are. Maybe she will tell me.”
He entered her (room) and locked the door behind him by closing the latch. He looked at her like that. Well, she was a good-looking, red (a sign of beauty) old woman.
He went to her and took off his pants while she was still crying. He raised her legs, put her down and screwed her; he fucked her.
After he had fucked her, she was quiet and her wailing stopped.
(The host) said, “Has she died, this daughter of a dog. What happened to her?” (The guest) looked (at her saying), “No, no, she is not dead, she is alive!”
He pulled on her trousers and went out. When he came they said, “How come? What happened to the old woman?”
He said, “I stroked her and healed her. By God’s will, she won’t cry anymore.” Then the guest left.
She remained silent until the morning of the next day. No sound came out of her until the next day.
In the morning she started again, but this time she was not crying,
but shouting, “I want it like yesterday, I want it like yesterday!”
“Tsk! Hey, what is this ‘like yesterday’?” Her son went to her, opened the door and said,
“Mother! How come? You were always crying boohoo, but now you have begun to say, “I want it like yesterday.” What is it ‘like yesterday’?”
She said, “The doctor who came yesterday, that young guy, he came and fucked me and I then I shut up.”
He said “Son of a dog, he fucked the old woman!” Enjoy it!
